response.overview: The making of the motion picture "The Right Stuff", focusing on the visual effects and other post-production, the premiere and disappointing box-office (caused by misidentification with John Glenn's presidential campaign), and the film's enduring legacy.
response.title: T-20 Years and Counting

release_dates.note: This title is featured on the 2-disc Special Edition DVD for The Right Stuff (1983), released in 2003.
